markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Wyrwood](/Traits.aspx?ID=371)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 310</row>

A wyrwood is a small, sapient living construct crafted of wood and powered with an aeon stone or a similar magical stone.
name: Wyrwood
